resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_110982</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_110982</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Emission and absorption spectra of an atom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Emission und Absorptionsspektren eines Atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectres d'émission et d'absorption d'un atome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectra da emissão e de absorption de um átomo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettri di assorbimento e dell'emissione di un 
atomo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φάσματα εκπομπής και απορρόφησης ενός ατόμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectros de la emisión y de absorción de un 
átomo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates that when white light passes through a certain atom, the atom emits the yellow light forming an emission spectrum and absorbs the other wavelengths of light forming an absorption spectrum.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absorption spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">emission spectra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">yellow light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, daß, wenn 
weißes Licht durch ein bestimmtes Atom überschreitet, das Atom das 
gelbe Licht ausstrahlt, das ein Emissionspektrum bildet und saugt die 
anderen Wellenlängen des Lichtes ein Absorptionsspektrum bildend auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre que quand la lumière 
blanche traverse un certain atome, l'atome émet la lumière jaune 
formant un spectre d'émission et absorbe les autres longueurs d'onde 
de la lumière formant un spectre d'absorption.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra que quando a luz branca 
passa através de um determinado átomo, o átomo se emite a luz 
amarela que dá forma a um spectrum de emissão e absorve os outros 
wavelengths da luz que dão forma a um spectrum de absorption.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra che quando la luce bianca 
attraversa un determinato atomo, l'atomo emette la luce gialla che 
forma uno spettro di emissione ed assorbe le altre lunghezze d'onda di
luce che formano uno spettro di assorbimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα διευκρινίζει ότι όταν τα άσπρα 
ελαφριά περάσματα μέσω ενός ορισμένου ατόμου, το άτομο 
εκπέμπουν το κίτρινο φως που διαμορφώνει ένα φάσμα εκπομπής και 
απορροφούν τα άλλα μήκη κύματος του φωτός που διαμορφώνει ένα 
φάσμα απορρόφησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra que cuando la luz blanca 
pasa a través de cierto átomo, el átomo emite la luz ámbar que 
forma un espectro de emisión y absorbe las otras longitudes de onda 
de la luz que forman un espectro de absorción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorptionsspektren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Emissionspektren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gelbes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">spectres d'absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Atomes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">spectres d'émission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière blanche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière jaune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectra de absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Átomos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectra de emissão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz branca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz amarela</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spettri di assorbimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Atomi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spettri di emissione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce bianca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce gialla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φάσματα απορρόφησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ατομα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φάσματα εκπομπής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άσπρο φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίτρινο φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espectros de absorción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Átomos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espectros de emisión</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz blanca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz ámbar</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
